name: Find Sukuna Finger
description:
A game with Jujutsu Kaisen theme.

Jogo (the player) is a curse that needs to find Sukuna finger to be stronger. He has to find the way through the maze.

Modifications:

1. A new player with new animation.

2. Anime characters, sukuna finger and the maze are created by me using Piskel website.

3. Replaced all audios and sounds except the shoting sound.

4. Change the game goal to get Sukuna finger instead of defeating shooters.

5. Add lives counter in the left corner.

Hope you enjoy playing my game!

Looking forwards for your reviews!

Thank you!
